mapper.select: SELECT p10_behavior.*,p10_casee.casee_number FROM p10_behavior LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_behavior.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id and p10_casee.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_behavior.del_flag = 0 and p10_behavior.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT p10_behavior.*, p10_project.project_id, p10_project.company_code, p10_project.status, p10_project.subject_persons, p10_casee.casee_number FROM p10_behavior LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_behavior.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id and p10_casee.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN p10_project ON p10_behavior.project_id = p10_project.project_id and p10_project.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_behavior.del_flag = 0 AND p10_behavior.subject_id = #{subjectId}

SELECT p10_behavior.*,p10_project.project_id,p10_project.company_code,p10_project.project_detail,p10_casee.casee_number FROM p10_behavior LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_behavior.casee_id = p10_casee.casee_id and p10_casee.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN p10_project ON p10_behavior.project_id = p10_project.project_id and p10_project.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_behavior.del_flag = 0 AND p10_behavior.behavior_id = #{behaviorId}
